It includes information on service fees, taxes, and a breakdown of voice usage during the billing period. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for Jeffrey E. The records span several days in April 2004 and provide insights into Epstein's communication patterns during that time. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for Jeffrey E. Epstein's AT&T Wireless account, including call times, durations, and locations. It highlights the frequency and nature of calls made and received, primarily in New York and Florida, during a specified period.
